text: Solarussa (Sabarùssa) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Oristano in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,425 people lived there. Its area is 31.86 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 12 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Oristano
title: Solarussa
